title: 67. Slugging, Pimple Patches, Hormonal Cysts, PIH, + More with Acne Specialist, Douglas Preston.
description: Hi Roomies, I'm back with my mentor + esthetician, Douglas Preston to answer some of your biggest questions about acne. We chat everything from "hormonal acne" to purging, acne treatments, and client relations. Purchase Douglas' Virtual or In-Person Trainings + Extractor Use code Tess10 for 10% off have a question for Douglas? email him: Douglas@prestonskincenter.com Have a topic request or question for a future episode? Comment on my latest @myestytessa. MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS You can shop my Glymed store here  or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical + Jan Marini.
